entities.description: The time frame of the past 12 months from [DATEFILL] through today.
Frequency of methamphetamine use, categorized by the mode or period, such as per week, month, or year.
Number of days methamphetamine was used in the past 12 months.
Average number of days methamphetamine was used each month during the past 12 months.
Average number of days methamphetamine was used each week during the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 12 months.
Classifies the number of days methamphetamine was used based on the specified frequency period.
Indicates the average number of days the respondent used methamphetamine each month during the past 12 months.
Indicates the average number of days the respondent used methamphetamine each week during the past 12 months.
